message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.bukkit.entity.*.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.arena.managers.ScoreboardManager' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.arena.managers.maprestorer.MapRestorerManager'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.arena.managers.ShopManager' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.arena.managers.maprestorer.MapRestorerManager'.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.arena.managers.ZombieSpawnManager' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.arena.managers.maprestorer.MapRestorerManager'.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - plugily.projects.villagedefense.arena.states.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.*' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Debugger'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.logging.Level' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Debugger'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.stream.Collectors' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.utils.Debugger'.
'else' child has incorrect indentation level 4, expected level should be 6.
